name: Cookie Clicker 2.0
description:
This is a free game I made with the help of C# and Visual Studio..

Enjoy the game.

It is currently in beta so some features may not work as intended.

You can use this in a video if you want to and play it for free.

If you can then please credit me in your video.

Run Cookie Clicker 2.0 to begin!

- MG
